actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, to provide that penalties incurred on account of premature withdrawal of funds from time savings accounts be allowed as a deduction from gross income in computing adjusted gross income.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 that penalties incurred on account of premature withdrawal of funds from time savings accounts shall be allowed as a deduction from gross income in computing adjusted gross income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, to provide that penalties incurred on account of premature withdrawal of funds from time savings accounts be allowed as a deduction from gross income in computing adjusted gross income.
